content: with a needle and pulling tight weave in ends ears make 2 1 attach yarn in round 20 with a slip_stitch 2 half_double_crochet 2 in the st of round 21 that s adjacent to the previously worked st 3 double_crochet 2 chain 1 double_crochet 2 in the st of round 22 that s adjacent to the previously worked st 4 half_double_crochet 2 in the st of round 23 that s adjacent to the previously worked st 5 slip_stitch in the st of round 24 that s adjacent to the previously worked st fasten o� and weave in ends
